page.title: 15The Plough at Norwell
page.content: There were once 3 pubs in Norwell but now there is only the{Plough,}on Main Street.This cosy village local has coal fires in the lounge and bar. There is also a separate Games Room with Pool Table, Juke Box, Space Invader and Fruit Machines. About one third of the trade is local. {Price Survey. Draught Beers (Pint)} (1) Bitter...Â£0.72 (3) Lager...Â£0.82 (2) Mild.....Â£0.70 (4) Cider...Â£0.84 {Bottled Beers (Pint) } (1) Brown Ale..................Â£0.76 (2) Light Ale..................Â£0.78 (3) Guinness...................Â£0.88 {Spirits } (1) Whiskey, Rum, Gin, Vodka...Â£0.63 (2) Brandy.....................Â£0.70 {Minerals } (1) Tonic and Bitter Lemon.....Â£0.32 (2) Coca Cola..................Â£0.37 (3) Britvic Orange.............Â£0.40
